content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Working with entries\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" explains the basics of working with entries, including how you can handle entry versions and localize entries.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.contentstack.com/docs/content-managers/working-with-entries/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Working with entries\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Contentstack lets content managers create entries and perform various operations on them.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://www.contentstack.com/docs/content-managers/entry-versions/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Entry versions\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". By default, entry versions are identified with numbers (for e.g., Version 1, Version 2). However, you can assign a name to a version for easy identification (for e.g., Production Ready, Do Not Edit).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/multilingual-content/localize-an-entry/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Localizing entries\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Localizing an entry allows it to break the inheritance from the fallback language and become independent.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
